items.title: Simultaneous Double Transits of Phobos and Deimos as Seen from the Martian Surface: A Millennium Catalogue
items.summary: arXiv:2602.18513v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: I present the first systematic catalogue of simultaneous solar transits of both Phobos and Deimos as observed from the surface of Mars. Using the JPL mar099 ephemeris (Brozovic et al. 2025) and SPICE toolkit, I searched the millenni…
